settings.title: Sonnen Batterie settings
settings.subtitle: Please provide information for api-usage.
settings.note: Please restart the app, after changing settings.
settings.frequencyHint: Frequency in seconds. How often to pull for data. Default is 30 seconds (30).
settings.authTokenHint: Auth Token is retrieved from user-login on your Sonnen Batterie system.
settings.savedOk: Settings saved. You can close this dialog now.
settings.confirmResetCycleCountBuffers: Are you sure you want to reset the cycle count tracking buffers? This will delete all accumulated cycle count history.
settings.cycleCountBuffersReset: Cycle count tracking buffers reset successfully.
settings.cycleCountBuffersNotReset: Could not reset cycle count tracking buffers.

connection.error_no_batteries: Could not find any Sonnen batteries on the local network. Please check your network and try again or provide static IP.
connection.notification_ip_changed: Sonnen Batterie: Change of IP address detected. New IP address: __ip__.
connection.error: Could not connect to the battery with IP '__ip__'. Please check the device settings.

notification.setToU: Sonnen Batterie: Set Time-of-Use between __startTime__ and __endTime__ with max. __maxPower__W.
notification.pausedToU: Sonnen Batterie: Paused Time-of-Use between __startTime__ and __endTime__.
notification.changedOperatingMode: Sonnen Batterie: Set operating mode to "__operatingMode__".
notification.startedManualCharging: Sonnen Batterie: Started manual charging with max. __maxPower__W.
notification.startedManualDischarging: Sonnen Batterie: Started manual discharging with max. __maxPower__W.

http.400: Bad request. Invalid data or validation failed.
http.401: Invalid Auth Token or required Read/Write API not enabled.

error.vpp_priority: Not allowed as SonnenVPP has priority.

validation.invalid_schedule_format: Invalid schedule format: expected an array.
validation.invalid_schedule_item_missing_properties: Invalid schedule item at index __index__: missing required properties.
validation.invalid_schedule_item_time_format: Invalid schedule item at index __index__: invalid time format: "__time__".
validation.invalid_ip_format: Invalid IP address format. Please enter a valid IPv4 address.

ToU.invalid threshold: Time-of-Use max. power value must be between 0 and 46000 watts.

validation.operatingModeChangeMismatchingTimeOfUseS: Cannot change operating mode away from Time-of-Use while setting a non-empty Time-of-Use schedule.
validation.timeOfUseChangeMismatchingOperatingModeC: Cannot apply Time-of-Use schedule when operating mode is being changed away from Time-of-Use.
validation.timeOfUseChangeMismatchingOperatingMode: Time-of-Use schedule can only be set when operating mode is Time-of-Use.
